name: TOSS Dried Rosemary Leaves, 3 LB Herbs Perfect for Seasoning and Spices Blends for Grilling and Cooking
short_description: PREMIUM QUALITY: Pure dried rosemary leaves carefully selected and processed to preserve natural flavor and aroma for cooking and seasoning needs

product_description: Elevate your culinary creations with these premium dried rosemary leaves. Perfect for both professional chefs and home cooks, this generous 3-pound package of aromatic rosemary adds a distinctive Mediterranean flair to your dishes. The carefully dried leaves retain their robust flavor and fragrant pine-like aroma, making them ideal for seasoning meats, poultry, vegetables, and savory baked goods. These versatile rosemary leaves can be used whole or crushed, working wonderfully in marinades, rubs, and spice blends for grilling. Whether you're slow-cooking a hearty stew, roasting potatoes, or creating your signature seasoning mix, these dried rosemary leaves deliver consistent flavor in every pinch. The resealable packaging helps maintain freshness, ensuring your herbs stay aromatic and flavorful for multiple uses. Add depth and character to your cooking with this essential herb that's a staple in both traditional and modern cuisine.

name: McCormick Gourmet Organic Crushed Rosemary, 1 Oz
short_description: McCormick Gourmet Organic Crushed Rosemary has a distinctive piney fragrance
Our carefully sourced rosemary is certified Organic and non GMO
Adds Mediterranean flavor to meats, roasted vegetables and potatoes
Essential to Herbes de Provence, an herb blend for stews, soups and meat
Excellent in desserts like pound cake and shortbread, as well as focaccia
product_description: With leaves resembling tiny pine needles and a piney fragrance to match, rosemary is a highly prized culinary herb. Our convenient crushed rosemary adds distinctive Mediterranean flavor to grilled or roasted meats, tomato sauce, roasted vegetables and potatoes. Rosemary is a perennial that is native to the Mediterranean basin, where the harsh, mountainous locales yield rosemary with deep green color, fragrant volatile oil and lemony, piney flavor. The herb is essential to Herbes de Provence, an herb blend for stews, soups and meat. Marinated lamb chops are just one example of its excellence with roasted meat. The surprise is that rosemary is also a delectable addition to desserts like pound cake and shortbread, as well as focaccia.
